name: Chambres
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main] Select 2 of your opponent's Characters with 9000 base power or less. Swap the base power of the selected Characters with each other during this turn.

name: Time for the Counterattack
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] If there is a Character with 8000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 red Character card with 2000 power or less from your hand.

name: I Have a Plan to Take Down One of the Four Emperors!!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} or {Straw Hat Crew} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Strive to Surpass me, Roronoa Zoro!!!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] You may rest 1 of your cards: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] You may rest 1 of your cards: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 7000 base power or less.

name: For Fun
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Main] You may rest 3 of your cards: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with 7000 base power or less.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: I Never Bother to Remember the Faces of Trash
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Main] You may rest 2 of your cards: Draw 1 card and rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 7000 base power or less.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Don't Worry!! I'm Here!!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main] All of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Leader and Character cards gain +1000 power during this turn.

name: Ocean Current Shoulder Throw
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Main] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: Play up to 1 {Fish-Man} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand. Then, return up to 1 Character with 6000 base power to the owner's hand.
[Counter] Draw 1 card and your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Please Take Me with You!! I Can Be of Great Help to You!!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main] If your Leader is [Jinbe] and you have 2 or less cards in your hand, draw 2 cards.
trigger: [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand.

name: Ever White
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Main] You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Penta-Chromatic String
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

name: Bullet String
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] DON!! −1: If your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, that card gains an additional +2000 power during this turn.

name: Ground Death
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Main] You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: Negate the effect of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less during this turn.
[Counter] If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

name: Ground Death
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Main] You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: Negate the effect of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less during this turn.
[Counter] If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

name: Hurry Up and Make Me the Pirate King!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type card other than [Hurry Up and Make Me the Pirate King!] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

name: Crescent Cutlass
effect:
[Main] If there is a Character with a cost of 0 or with a cost of 8 or more, all of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works" gain +3 cost until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Disappointed?
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Baroque Works" other than [Disappointed?] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

name: Salamander
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, play up to 1 {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

name: Brick Bat
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your trash rested.

name: You'll Frighten Me... ♡
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] If you have 2 or less Life cards, up to 1 of your opponent's active Characters cannot attack during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and a [Trigger] from your hand.

name: You'll Frighten Me... ♡
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] If you have 2 or less Life cards, up to 1 of your opponent's active Characters cannot attack during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and a [Trigger] from your hand.
